name: FileReader
description: The FileReader object lets web applications asynchronously read the contents of files (or raw data buffers) stored on the user's computer, using File or Blob objects to specify the file or data to read.

members.name: FileReader.error
members.description: A DOMError representing the error that occurred while reading the file.

members.name: FileReader.readyState
members.description: A number indicating the state of the FileReader. This is one of the following: EMPTY 0 No data has been loaded yet. LOADING 1 Data is currently being loaded. DONE 2 The entire read request has been completed.

members.name: FileReader.result
members.description: The file's contents. This property is only valid after the read operation is complete, and the format of the data depends on which of the methods was used to initiate the read operation.

members.name: FileReader.onabort
members.description: A handler for the abort event. This event is triggered each time the reading operation is aborted.

members.name: FileReader.onerror
members.description: A handler for the error event. This event is triggered each time the reading operation encounter an error.

members.name: FileReader.onload
members.description: A handler for the load event. This event is triggered each time the reading operation is successfully completed.

members.name: FileReader.onloadstart
members.description: A handler for the loadstart event. This event is triggered each time the reading is starting.

members.name: FileReader.onloadend
members.description: A handler for the loadend event. This event is triggered each time the reading operation is completed (either in success or failure).

members.name: FileReader.onprogress
members.description: A handler for the progress event. This event is triggered while reading a Blob content.

members.name: FileReader.abort()
members.description: Aborts the read operation. Upon return, the readyState will be DONE.

parameters.name: DOM_FILE_ABORT_ERR
parameters.description: Thrown when abort is called while no read operation is in progress (that is, the state isn't LOADING).

members.name: FileReader.readAsArrayBuffer()
members.description: Starts reading the contents of the specified Blob, once finished, the result attribute contains an ArrayBuffer representing the file's data.

parameters.name: blob
parameters.description: The Blob or File from which to read.

members.name: FileReader.readAsBinaryString()
members.description: Starts reading the contents of the specified Blob, once finished, the result attribute contains the raw binary data from the file as a string.

parameters.name: blob
parameters.description: The Blob or File from which to read.

members.name: FileReader.readAsDataURL()
members.description: Starts reading the contents of the specified Blob, once finished, the result attribute contains a data: URL representing the file's data.

parameters.name: blob
parameters.description: The Blob or File from which to read.

members.name: FileReader.readAsText()
members.description: Starts reading the contents of the specified Blob, once finished, the result attribute contains the contents of the file as a text string.

parameters.name: blob
parameters.description: The Blob or File from which to read.

parameters.name: encoding Optional
parameters.description: A string specifying the encoding to use for the returned data. By default, UTF-8 is assumed if this parameter is not specified.
